TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
That's because you ordered the dance party soup! So, you come here often?

Waiter, there's the KSP Forums in my soup.

Soup-ception... After all you did order the ksp forum soup

Waiter theres a monolith in my soup!

You wanted to see a small civilization grow up. The beef bits are having a religious war. They're cute when they're young.

Waiter, the user above me is in my soup!

Get out of there, Walrus!

Waiter, there's a Gilly in my soup.

You ordered the Potato Soup right?

Waiter, there's HarvesteR in my soup!

Don't mind him, he's just developing Kerbal Soup Program.

Waiter, there's a book in my soup.

You asked for "Brain Food"

Waiter, my soup is eating itself.

No, it's just evaporating. Wait, there's a hole in the soup...

Waiter! There's a bunch of people in my soup! The soup is making inhuman roars and expanded dramatically, too.

Must be at least 50,000 people in that soup.

Waiter, there is... *gibberish*

KLfgILGfliueh;FGUIO:EYo;ehgtfiE:ITFGu&*OET#UHrtb.EUTYIL.LKUi3l47@#RGLITi37;FUO

Waiter, there's a triangle in my soup!

You asked for triangle-shaped carrot soup.

Waiter, there is a nonagon in my soup!

You asked for a polygon soup.

Waiter my pen. Is in the soup and is rapidly expanding and growing!

Is it a space pen? Because they're not supposed to do that...

Waiter, there's a hypetrain in my soup, and it's not even CLOSE to the release of .25!

Edited August 20, 2014 by Mrsupersonic8
The Russians used pencils, BTW.

Silly, that's no hype train it's a regular steam locomotive, used to create that "steaming" effect of a hot soup.

Waiter!!! There's a fly sleeping in my soup, and it snores loudly! >:-[

Silly, that's no hype train it's a regular steam locomotive, used to create that "steaming" effect of a hot soup.

Waiter!!! There's a fly sleeping in my soup, and it snores loudly! >:-[

Here's a little pillow for it.
Waiter!! There's a mushroom in my soup!

That's the shroom soup.*Guys, i think he's on to us...*

Waiter, there's a clone of myself in the soup! (Or am I in my soup?)

It's a wormhole to a parallel universe!

Waiter, there's a talking raccoon in my soup!

Yes, and may I make a remark on its fantastic vocabulary...

Waiter there is a 4chan in my soup!

Whatever you do, do not spill it! The universe can't handle the chaos!

Waiter, there's a dwarf in my soup.

Do you know how to dwarf?

Waiter, there is PlanetSide 2 in my soup!

Did it come with an Auraxis?

Waiter, there's an imgur in my soup!

Smother it with albums and image sauce!

Waiter, there's a NERVA in my soup!

Sorry, is his nose getting in the way?

Waiter, there's a penguin war in my soup.

That's black maggots battling on your Ice soup. Let me go and get you a new soup...

Waiter, there's a https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0PFxJMFik_E in my soup!
